content: Yes, I understand your request. You want me to write an article for an inexperienced female audience aged 23-30, focusing on pregnancy health and nutrition. The article should be informative, using short sentences, active voice, and a third-person point of view. The writing voice should be neutral and objective, while the tone should be friendly yet professional. Additionally, I should incorporate perplexity and burstiness in the text, to make it less uniform and more human-like.
